mapper.select: select * from EMP order by EMPNO
select empno, ename, job, mgr, hiredate, sal, comm, deptno from EMP WHERE empno LIKE '%${param1}%' order by empno
mapper.insert: insert into emp(empno, ename, job, mgr, hiredate, sal, comm, deptno) values(#{empno}, #{ename}, #{job}, #{mgr}, sysdate, #{sal}, #{comm}, #{deptno})
mapper.update: update EMP set ename=#{ename}, job=#{job}, mgr=#{mgr}, sal=#{sal}, comm=#{comm}, deptno=#{deptno} where empno=#{empno}
